data.message: Everybody's worshipping Eminem like he's the shit talking about the president. Dude you're a fucking hypocrite. You rap about killing people,  guns,  drugs,  and hire you would kill Kim and your own mother. Then you bash Trump for the same things you live for. You're nothing to be worshipped about you're a loser a rich soon to be broke hypocrite. You call him a racist then talk about him being orange.. Singling out a particular skin color.... Last I checked that's the definition of a racist you skin head hypocrite raising your fist like your a white black panther.. You wouldn't last 35 seconds in places I've been. Im not for Trump but look what he is up against.. We got North Korea trying to invade us and Isis' bullshit. I hope this letter makes you and your followers realize how much of a hypocritical bitch you truly are!! Just like back in the day you rapped about having hatred towards gays 2 days later you were begging Elton John to suck his dick. So tell me who is the real faggot? Who's the real hypocrite? You're a crack headed skin head you need to retire go back to the factory rewrite you freestyle to Trump and put the last one in the garbage because right now your hypocrisy is trash.. Let's see how many followers and ass kissers you have after everyone realizes who and what you truly are. You fucking disgrace!! You haven't b been rap relevant in 12 years I guess that's how you finally had the time to grow a beard. You piece of white shit..oops did he just say the "W" word? Yes I did. Funny how Hailey looks more manly than you do.
